A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People complained that Force awakens was too much of a copy of episode 4 A New Hope and now that we have a new episode which follows its own story people are complaining again. Don’t let anyone tell you this movie isn’t worth seeing\, it’s amazing. Is it my favorite Star Wars movie? No\, but it’s by no means a bad movie. The action is top notch and the characters are better than ever. Don’t let haters ruin this for you
